item_prototype.name: Domain "{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_DOMAIN_NAME}" days to expire
item_prototype.description: End of Domain name registration in days.

item_prototype.name: Domain "{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_DOMAIN_NAME}" registrar
item_prototype.description: Network information center who registered this Domain name.

item_prototype.name: Domain "{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_DOMAIN_NAME}" run check
item_prototype.description: Fake item for periodical run of tests.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Website metrics legacy:website_metrics.domain.daystoexpire[{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_DOMAIN_NAME}].last()}<8 & {Template Website metrics legacy:website_metrics.domain.daystoexpire[{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_DOMAIN_NAME}].last()}>1 & {Template Website metrics legacy:website_metrics.domain.status[{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_DOMAIN_NAME}].sum(#3)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Domain "{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_DOMAIN_NAME}" is expiring to 7 days ({ITEM.LASTVALUE1} left)

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Website metrics legacy:website_metrics.domain.daystoexpire[{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_DOMAIN_NAME}].last()}<31 & {Template Website metrics legacy:website_metrics.domain.daystoexpire[{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_DOMAIN_NAME}].last()}>7 & {Template Website metrics legacy:website_metrics.domain.status[{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_DOMAIN_NAME}].sum(#3)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Domain "{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_DOMAIN_NAME}" is expiring to 30 days ({ITEM.LASTVALUE1} left)

item_prototype.name: SSL "{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_SSL_URL}" run check
item_prototype.description: Fake item for periodical run of tests.

item_prototype.name: SSL "{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_SSL_URL}" serial number
item_prototype.description: Unique serial number of SSL certificate.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Website metrics legacy:website_metrics.ssl.daystoexpire[{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_SSL_URL}].last()}<8 & {Template Website metrics legacy:website_metrics.ssl.daystoexpire[{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_SSL_URL}].last()}>1 & {Template Website metrics legacy:website_metrics.ssl.status[{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_SSL_URL}].sum(#3)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Certificate "{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_SSL_URL}" is expiring to 7 days ({ITEM.LASTVALUE1} left)

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Website metrics legacy:website_metrics.ssl.daystoexpire[{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_SSL_URL}].last()}<31 & {Template Website metrics legacy:website_metrics.ssl.daystoexpire[{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_SSL_URL}].last()}>7 & {Template Website metrics legacy:website_metrics.ssl.status[{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_SSL_URL}].sum(#3)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Certificate "{#WEBSITE_METRICS_LLD_SSL_URL}" is expiring to 30 days ({ITEM.LASTVALUE1} left)

trigger.name: Web site "{$WEBSITE_METRICS_URL}" high average response time > {$WEBSITE_METRICS_TIMEOUT} sec
trigger.description: High average response time of website.

trigger.name: Web site "{$WEBSITE_METRICS_URL}" is down
trigger.description: There is no response from website.

trigger.name: Web site "{$WEBSITE_METRICS_URL}" test phrase failed
trigger.description: There is no Test phrase on site.
